snippet.title: DOOM INCARNATE v3.1 All Weapons Showcase for Blazkowicz
snippet.description:
DOOM Incarnate 3.1 Mod for any type of classic DOOM you want, this is gameplay modification with TONS of weapons. There are two playable character but I've focused mostly on Blazko because he is the only one that has access to heavy weaponry, Rayne unfortunately has only her melee weapon unique. This modification has also TONS of upgrades for each weapon, there are 3 of them for these weapons that are not heavy and they are unique. You can have multiple types of ammunition, different firemodes, silencers, bouncing projectiles, nuclear fallout upon impact, longer range, stun, electric discharges - trust me, it's a lot! The heavy weapons are a little bit different, they cannot be upgraded nor their ammo can be replenished, but their damage is incredible. For more info, trust me it's better to simply visit a topic in description below.

00:00 - Hatchet
00:18 - Submachine Gun
00:49 - Handgun 1961
01:18 - Black Rose Revolver
01:52 - Inferno Shotgun
02:20 - Super Shotgun
02:55 - Grimhammer Shotgun
03:38 - Assault Rifle
04:02 - FG61 Paratrooper Rifle
04:38 - GPVG Venom Gun MK3
05:18 - Grenades
05:48 - Napalmkraftwerk
06:18 - Kampfpistole
06:48 - Plasma Rifle
07:16 - Laserkraftwerk
07:50 - Leichenfaust
08:24 - Teslakanone
09:00 - Schutzengel
09:36 - Hammergewehr
10:07 - Schmerzmittel
10:41 - MG60
11:18 - Totenkopf
12:00 - Napalmgewehr
12:48 - Ubergewehr
13:19 - Lasergewehr

My Discord Server - https://discord.gg/skpZWagjTJ
DOOM Incarnate - https://forum.zdoom.org/viewtopic.php?t=58594
Bolognese - https://www.moddb.com/mods/brutal-doom/downloads/bolognese-gore-mod-v20
Music - The Slayer Path https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5LR22ukkrVM
Gigaslayer https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FHjh51DenAU
BFG Division Wolfenstein Remix https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2gJNwZUGLF0
Maps - Back To Saturn X Episode I & II
